name: Action Reactor VR
detailed_description:
Action Reactor (Alpha) is a hardcore retro-electronic VR shooter inspired by classic FPS & vector arcade games. Dash, doublejump and pulverize your enemies with akimbo gunplay and insane slomo stunts in this wild romp through a neon laser inferno!

"TERMINAL - once pure and perfect - has been corrupted. For every millisecond, the malicious SYNDROTE reformats a new sector. Your mission is to deploy a PULSE BOMB in the TERMINAL CORE to reboot it. In your path stands a vast array of BADASS ELECTRONIC WARRIORS, hell-bent on your deletion."

This game was made out of a love for the pace, feel and hardcore difficulty of 90s FPS games – and the clean look of vector games and vintage CGI.

FEATURES
  • Pure, fast-paced and addictive 90s FPS gameplay in Room-scale VR
  • Clean vector & low-poly art style inspired by classic arcade games
  • Rapid & slomo locomotion with great freedom of movement
  • Procedural platform maps and roguelike population logic for max replayability
  • Dynamic body dismemberment and shattering
  • Advanced active ragdoll physics with animation blending and muscle simulation
  • 4 Skill modes, ranging from lame to extremely hardcore.

THINGS TO DO
  • Ambush, assault and assassinate using crazy slow motion stunts and akimbo weapon combos
  • Blast your enemies to pieces, steal their weapons and "mine" their corpses for health
  • Unlock forcefields and new level branches by finding secret switches, keys and items hidden in the environment
  • Adapt your play style; swift stealth and surgical strikes can sometimes be as effective as frontal assault
